Result.Title: Career Opportunity for Girls with STEM Education
Result.Description: Women development cell, LDCE celebrates International Day for Women & Girls in Science.
Result.HtmlContent: Women Development Cell of L.D. College of Engineering, Ahmedabad¬† is celebrating International Day for Women & Girls in Science on 11th February 2022, Friday @ 2.00 pm with an online webinar on Career Opportunity for Girls with STEM Education¬† & Entrepreneurship in association with IIC ( Institution's Innovation Council) and SSIP, LDCE Ahmedabad¬†Eminent Speaker : Dr. Megha Bhatt (Women Scientist & Founder- Sci.Know.Tech) as well as State President WICCI STEM Education.¬†Link of Joining on Ms Teams Platform: https://byrl.me/kwZHQci¬†¬†üìåüóíJoin us on:¬†11th February 2022 ( Friday) @ 2:00pm¬†Patron :Dr. R.K. Gajjar, Principal, LDCE Ahmedabad.¬†Coordinator :Prof. R N Shukla ,¬†Associate. Prof., Civil Engineering Department, L.D.C.E.¬†¬†#women #stemeducation #Careers #entrepreneurship #girls #sciknowtech

Result.Title: Career Guidance Program
Result.Description: Program to guide students for their career path
Result.HtmlContent: Rotary Club in Conjunction with L. D. College of Engineering and L. D. Alumni Association brings CAREER GUIDANCE PROGRAM for all the students of L. D. College to help them decide their Career path. Students will be guided by our honorable guests Shri Paresh Vasani (CEO, PCB Power Inc.), Shri Dilip Rana (IAS, Dy. Mun. Commissioner, AMC) and Capt. Adhir Patel (Indian Navy).

Result.Title: Health Checkup Camp
Result.Description: A Health Checkup Camp was organized by L. D. College of Engineering in coordination with eSwasthya.
Result.HtmlContent: A specialised free health check-up camp was organized for academic and non-academic staff of L.D College of Engineering in associaion with the eSwasthya club. eSwasthya club is a one-stop solution for all health needs like health checkup, pathology, etc. 150 staff members got benifit from the camp.¬†A team of doctors from thyrocare for pathology and body check-up and team of volunteers from eSwasthya supported the camp.

Result.Title: Dell Campassador Program
Result.Description: DELL provides an opportunity to students to represent Dell in their colleges as 'Dell Campassadors'
Result.HtmlContent: The pan-India¬†program¬†‚ÄòDell Campassador Program‚Äô is focused on creating deeper engagement through campus¬†ambassadors¬†across the country. Computer student Parth Shah & Atul Shah, Secretary (LAA) visited DELL, Bangalore to participate in the competition. LD earned 6th rank out of 26 colleges from all over India.

Result.Title: Aagaaz
Result.Description: LDCE Alumni Association relaunched after a break of three years with "Aagaaz- The story begins here"
Result.HtmlContent: The fest was celebrated on the 31st of January and 1st of February with technical events like workshops of Employability Workshop, Full Stack Development Workshop, Evelctric Vehicle Workshop as well as Non-Technical Events as Techno Hunt, Shutter up and Open mic.¬†

Result.Title: Computer Lab Donation and Inaugration
Result.Description: Alumni batch of 1983 donated Computer Lab of Electrical Department, L.D.C.E.
Result.HtmlContent: Computer Lab of Electrical Department, LDCE was donated and inaugurated by ALUMNI Batch of 1983 with the sole purpose that each student must be availed with practical knowledge along with theoretical books. Students can access the computer lab anytime to gain information and acquire skills. We acknowledge the efforts of Alumni for their invaluable contribution.

Result.Title: Kaizen 2019
Result.Description: Kaizen is a Project Exhibition of final year students of B.E., P.D.D.C. & M E.conducted by L.D.C.E.
Result.HtmlContent: KAIZEN  is a ceremony for final year students of B.E. and M.E. Both, B.E. students & M.E. students will have project display and presentation programme. Judges are invited from LD alumnis, expert from varies Industries & academics. Prizes are sponsored by LAA. All prices are donated by our eminent alumnis.

Result.Title: Eco Green Vehicle Challenge
Result.Description: EGVC aims at bringing out creative ideas regarding vehicles that are environmental friendly.
Result.HtmlContent: As we can get an idea from the name, EGVC aims at bringing out creative ideas regarding vehicles that are environmental friendly. The first EGVC was held in 2014 under which 18 teams participated and showcased their skills with enthusiasm. This trend continued and the event became popular at a national level. EGVC-2019 witness some of the brightest talent from the states of Madhya Pradesh, Maharashtra, Punjab and Gujarat. It had a tremendous response with the hard efforts of all the students.

Result.Title: LAA Garba 2015
Result.Description: LAA GARBA has been one of the most succesful events of LDCE  since last so many years
Result.HtmlContent: LAA garba has been one of the most succesful event of its kind with maximum participation of not only youngsters but all age groups from all over the city. It is a two night festival where student, alumni and faculties from college participates and enjoy the festival. An event full of energy and excitement is what we call ‚ÄúLAA Garba‚Äù.Garba hoy to khali LAA Garba
Result.Venue: LDCE Cricket Ground, L. D. College of Engineering

Result.Title: SAHITYA SARITA 2019
Result.Description: Sahitya Sarita is a benchmark Literature Festival organized by L.D. College of Engineering.
Result.HtmlContent: Sahitya Sarita is a benchmark Literature Festival organized by L.D. College of Engineering, Ahmedabad. This was the first time that any Technical Institute is having a Literature Festival. Sahitya Sarita is a platform on which various themes like Literature, Laughter, Music and Art are celebrated by engineering students. This fest has been organised solely for the purpose of awareness of literature among the youth. The aim of this event is being saved with more and more love and enthusiasm over years.

Result.Title: THANGAAT- EK SATRANGI AAGHAZ
Result.Description: THANGAAT- EK SATRANGI AAGHAZ is a GARBA festival Introduced by enthusiasts students of LDCE.
Result.HtmlContent: ‚ÄúTHANGAAT- EK SATRANGI AAGHAZ‚Äù is a GARBA festival Introduced by enthusiasts‚Äô students of LDCE for all the students, faculty members, family, friends and hardcore amdawadi's. The main motive of this event is to embrace our culture and cherish it amongst all of us. The whole garba event is enjoyed by 15,000+ crowd over the songs sung by some of the famous singers. This garba is honoured by the presence of some well-known chief guests.Thangaat atle apno LD no garbo.

Result.Title: REUNION OF 1994 BAtch
Result.Description: LDCE Alumni Association and Batch of 1994 organized a reunion on 28th December, 2019.
Result.HtmlContent: LDCE Alumni Association and Batch of 1994 organized a reunion on 28th December, 2019 celebrating their 25 years of graduation. They were very glad to see each other after such a long time. Taking a campus tour, everyone realized, a lot has changed in the college during this duration of 25 years and missed being a part of LDCE. Some of the alumni showcased their singing talent and the '90s were reborned. After an interesting game of Mithakshari, prizes were awarded to the alumni for different categories. It was a nostalgic moment for everyone as they relived their college days after completing their silver jubilee.

Result.Title: REUNION OF 1970 BATCH
Result.Description: LDCE Alumni Association and Batch of 1970 organized a reunion on 17th January, 2020.
Result.HtmlContent: LDCE Alumni Association and Batch of 1970 organized a reunion on 17th January, 2020 as a celebration upon achieving the golden jubilee of their graduation. Everyone were elated seeing each other after such a long interval of time. They remembered the days when engineering was studied in a completely different way comparing today and chuckled together recollecting their golden memories from the campus after 50 years. Interacting with the current students and getting to know about the current status of the college made them feel energized such that they even forgot their age. Everyone were feeling sentimental coming to college after such a long time as if their one of the precious part is still left here.
